itemDisplayName: JBoss EAP server running a test clustering application
description: This template allows you to create an Red Hat scale set running JBoss cluster EAP 7 and and also deploy a web application called eap-session-replication, you can login into the admin console using the user and password configured at the time of the deployment.
summary: Deploy a web application to test Red Hat scale set running JBoss EAP7 in cluster mode
